recipe.title: Coconut, Cacao Chia Pots
recipe.introduction: These creamy pots of yumminess are packed full of fibre and heart health omega 3 fats. They also happen to be vegan, gluten and dairy free! Enjoy at breakfast or anytime of the day!
recipe.description: These creamy pots of yumminess are packed full of fibre and heart health omega 3 fats. They also happen to be vegan, gluten and dairy free! Enjoy at breakfast or anytime of the day!
ingredients: 130ml coconut milk or any plant milk
1 tbsp raw cacao powder or cocoa powder
method: Add the milk, chia seeds, maple syrup and cacao to a small bowl or jug. Mix well making sure the cacao is well combined.
Mix in the coconut yogurt, then divide the mixture between two small glasses or ramekins.
Chill in the fridge until required.
